author: Esther Emma
content:
Wow
such bright colors
that's the reason i'm so taken with your images
all the graytones and than wham
a kind of orangedyellow
(i've got always a discussion about this kind of orange yellow. most people say this is orange, but for me it is yellow. the rims ok orange, but on the most light parts, upper right side, certainly yellow to me) ðŸ™‚
let's call it in between ðŸ™‚

one thing is certain.
i love it. 
if i could fave it .....

a good start for this week, andreas.
we've got here a frozen white world.
that's my kind of winterðŸ™‚
hope you have wonderful weather too ðŸ™‚

shara nelson: strong voice illustrating moments of silence
